cells.data:
Dump all open windows on a display

This command helps identify window titles to add floating support

while true
do
  echo "*******************************" >> /tmp/watch_output.txt
  yabai -m query --windows --display 1 2>&1 | tee -a /tmp/watch_output.txt
done

Get details for currently active window

Note: The sleep time allows you to quickly open and focus on the window in question.
